definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Conclusion The gingival recession and the wedge shaped defect are common dental diseases in the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 结论牙龈退缩与楔状缺损是中老年人常见的牙病。

sentences.english: Physical Activity, Adiposity, and Diabetes Risk in Middle-Aged and Older Chinese Population.
sentences.chinese: 中国中老年人体育锻炼，肥胖，糖尿病风险。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo examine the validities of Working Memory Test Battery (WMTB) in the older adults.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估工作记忆成套测验在中老年人群中的效度。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the health condition and hospitalizing behavior among the middle age and the aged people living in town and country.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解城乡中老年人的健康状况与就医行为。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the adjuvant treatment effect on senility and middle-age lumber vertebrae diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索太极拳对中老年人腰椎病辅助治疗的疗效。

sentences.english: Eg Young people enjoy popular music while the mid-aged and the old prefer classic one.
sentences.chinese: 青年人爱听流行乐，而中老年人更喜欢古典乐。

sentences.english: For the professional middle-aged and elderly as well as new and old customers.
sentences.chinese: 专业为中老年人以及广大新老客户服务。

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
